Control.Text: To get started, use the 'Add' button in the lower left corner to add a new aura.

SpellName
Control.Tooltip: Name of the spell to track the cooldown of. Leave blank to use the Aura name.

Control.Name: KeybindTrackerHelp
Control.Tooltip: Keybind Tracker will monitor the key you specify. When the key is pressed, the trigger will pass until the specified duration elapses.
